about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Falling Down XR - an exciting collection of games from various genres designed for virtual reality.

Platformer: In this game, your goal is to jump from one flying platform to another and descend to the bottom as quickly as possible. Press the game stop button at the right moment to record your time and become the most agile player. At first glance, it may seem easy and even a bit dull, but remember that you are in virtual reality, where all your hidden fears of height and speed come to life. Experience the true pleasure of platforms rushing past you, the wind whistling in your ears, and the enchanting beauty of the world from a bird's-eye view.

In the demo version of the game, you only have access to one level:
  • Cubic City and its destructive tornado.

    Two more await you in the full version of the game.
  • Data Center, a digital realm inspired by the magnificent Matrix.
  • Space Adventure: Defend your ship from pirate attacks.

Another type of VR entertainment available in the demo version, , First-Person Shooter:
Before facing this challenging battle, it's a good idea to undergo the training of a real special forces fighter. For this purpose, we've prepared a training level with obstacle courses, shooting ranges, and moving targets that shoot back. Your enemies have received training from the best instructors and can shoot with precision. Don't move in a straight line; zigzag like a hare.
detailed_description:
Note:

Requires virtual reality helmet. Check out the system requirements to learn more.


About the Demo

Welcome to the world of Falling Down XR - an exciting collection of games from various genres designed for virtual reality.

Platformer: In this game, your goal is to jump from one flying platform to another and descend to the bottom as quickly as possible. Press the game stop button at the right moment to record your time and become the most agile player. At first glance, it may seem easy and even a bit dull, but remember that you are in virtual reality, where all your hidden fears of height and speed come to life. Experience the true pleasure of platforms rushing past you, the wind whistling in your ears, and the enchanting beauty of the world from a bird's-eye view.

In the demo version of the game, you only have access to one level:
  • Cubic City and its destructive tornado.

    Two more await you in the full version of the game.
  • Data Center, a digital realm inspired by the magnificent Matrix.
  • Space Adventure: Defend your ship from pirate attacks.

Another type of VR entertainment available in the demo version, , First-Person Shooter:
Before facing this challenging battle, it's a good idea to undergo the training of a real special forces fighter. For this purpose, we've prepared a training level with obstacle courses, shooting ranges, and moving targets that shoot back. Your enemies have received training from the best instructors and can shoot with precision. Don't move in a straight line; zigzag like a hare.
name: Falling Down XR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalen
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • VR Support: Open XR
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • VR Support: Open XR
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended

short_description: Falling Down XR invites you to an immersive VR adventure. Our game is a compilation of several game genres. Choose what you like. Jump on moving platforms, find your way through a maze or unleash a hurricane fire on evil forces.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
